If your planned Walrus host runs a Xen kernel, install the kmod-drbd83-xen package on that host. Otherwise, skip this step.

Install the Eucalyptus node controller software on each planned NC host. Clouds that use the VMware hypervisor do not have NCs; if you plan to use VMware then skip this step.
Install the software for the remaining Eucalyptus components. The following example shows most components being installed on the same host. We recommend using different hosts for each component.
